mapper.select: select Oid,Orderform.Uid,Orderform.Sid,Aid,Ototalbooksprice,Ototaltransprice, date_format(Osubmittime,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s'),date_format(Opaytime,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s'), date_format(Oreceivetime,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s'),date_format(Ofinishedtime,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s'), Ostatus,Shop.Sicon,Shop.Sname from onlinebookstore.orderform Orderform,onlinebookstore.shop Shop where Orderform.Oid= #{oid} and Orderform.Sid=Shop.Sid limit 1
select count(*) from onlinebookstore.orderform where Uid=#{uid}

select Oid,Orderform.Uid,Orderform.Sid,Aid,Ototalbooksprice,Ototaltransprice,Osubmittime,Ostatus,Shop.Sicon,Shop.Sname from onlinebookstore.orderform Orderform,onlinebookstore.shop Shop where Orderform.Uid=#{uid} and Orderform.Sid=Shop.Sid order by Osubmittime DESC

select Book.Bid,Bimage,Bname,Boriprice,Bprice,Tboughtnum,Tstatus from onlinebookstore.orderform Orderform,onlinebookstore.transaction t,onlinebookstore.book Book where Orderform.Oid = #{Oid} and Orderform.Oid=t.Oid and t.Bid=Book.Bid;

select Oid,Orderform.Uid,Orderform.Sid,Aid,Ototalbooksprice,Ototaltransprice,Osubmittime,Ostatus,Shop.Sicon,Shop.Sname from onlinebookstore.orderform Orderform,onlinebookstore.shop Shop where Orderform.Sid=#{Sid} and Orderform.Sid=Shop.Sid order by Osubmittime DESC
